Name: Meryl Lynchburg
Ingredients: Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (or mug), TOP with soda water
Review: A long refreshing 'sugar' free whiskey iced tea-style drink.
History: Discovered in 2009 at Underdog Bar, Clapham, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Meryl Lynchburg contains 183 calories
